reasoning: Coronaropathy (coronary artery disease/pathology) is a major cardiovascular condition. Incidence of acute coronary events approximately 150-200 per 100k globally; prevalence of coronary artery disease approximately 3-5% (3000-5000 per 100k). Both metrics relevant given chronic nature with acute exacerbations.
source: WHO cardiovascular disease epidemiology, global burden of disease estimates
